column.name: description
column.value: I'm so stupid because I refuse to think that I'm getting older. I get up in the morning, and it's like, 'La, la, la, I'm so pretty.' I still mingle with a lot with young people. I even go to college campuses to talk to them because I know how they think. They don't think I'm boring, either. They think I'm cool, but I want them to think I'm hot!

column.name: description
column.value: I’m not flirting. I’m just being extra nice to someone who is extra attractive.

column.name: description
column.value: When you play a game of thrones you win or you die.

column.name: description
column.value: Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle.

column.name: description
column.value: Give me honorable enemies rather than ambitious ones, and I'll sleep more easily by night.

column.name: description
column.value: Every flight begins with a fall.
